灶君.definition: Zaoshen, the god of the kitchen; also written 灶神

灶王.definition: Zaoshen, the god of the kitchen; also written 灶神

灶王爺.definition: Zaoshen, the god of the kitchen; also written 灶神

灶神.definition: Zaoshen, the god of the kitchen

灶神星.definition: Vesta, an asteroid, second most massive object in the asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter, discovered in 1807 by H.W. Olbers
